code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";var movieAPI={getPopularHome:function getPopularHome(API_Key){var url="movie/popular?api_key=".concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US");return axiosClient.get(url);},getTrailerHome:function getTrailerHome(API_Key,id){var url="movie/".concat(id,"/videos?api_key=").concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US");return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieInfo:function getMovieInfo(API_Key,id){var url="movie/".concat(id,"?api_key=").concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US");return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieCast:function getMovieCast(API_Key,id){var url="movie/".concat(id,"/credits?api_key=").concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US");return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieExternalId:function getMovieExternalId(API_Key,id){var url="movie/".concat(id,"/external_ids?api_key=").concat(API_Key);return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieRecommend:function getMovieRecommend(API_Key,id){var url="movie/".concat(id,"/recommendations?api_key=").concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US&page=1");return axiosClient.get(url);},getMoviePopular:function getMoviePopular(API_Key,page){var url="movie/popular?api_key=".concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US&page=").concat(page);return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieNowPlaying:function getMovieNowPlaying(API_Key,page){var url="movie/now_playing?api_key=".concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US&page=").concat(page);return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieUpcoming:function getMovieUpcoming(API_Key,page){var url="movie/upcoming?api_key=".concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US&page=").concat(page);return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieToprated:function getMovieToprated(API_Key,page){var url="movie/top_rated?api_key=".concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US&page=").concat(page);return axiosClient.get(url);},getMovieGenres:function getMovieGenres(API_Key){var url="genre/movie/list?api_key=".concat(API_Key,"&language=en-US");return axiosClient.get(url);}};export default movieAPI;
